title: Design production Assistant (m/w/d)
description: Helping Assistant Designer to complete technical sheets, work on fittings and data entry for fits and production changes.
full_description: ["Introduction: We are a small artisinal leather brand who is expanding, www.lthjkt.com. Design studio is based in Kreuzberg, Berlin. Sales and distribution offices based in Los Angeles, California.We are looking for someone to join the Kreuzberg studio who wants to grow and embark on new challenges!Description: Closely monitoring the production calendar to meet deadlines, preparing shipments and tracking samples are some of their everyday duties.Proto sample and Pre-production sample tracking plus organizing, as well as following up with vendors from India and Europe. Updating factory packing lists including daily email and WhatsApp telephone communications. Work closely with all members of the design, product development, sales and planning teams, ensuring all tasks are completed by scheduled deadlines. Analyzing weekly production reports to anticipate upcoming issues is another key responsibility, helping the team anticipate and avoid problems.Helping Assistant Designer to complete technical sheets, work on fittings and data entry for fits and production changes.Required: Successful candidates are expected to pitch in wherever necessary to get the job done, even with tasks that don’t traditionally fall under their realm. Accountability is a key skill set required.Strong communication skills required. Ability to work with multiple people and time zones as our teams are in India and Los Angeles. Hours need to be flexible for international calls.Previous experience in apparel design is preferred.Previous experience in leather goods is preferred but not required.2 years in product development or apparel production is required.English language written and verbal is a must.Job Type: Part-timeSalary: 10.00€ /hourExperience:Produktion: 1 year (Preferred)production: 1 year (Required)Education:Bachelor's (Preferred)Location:10967 Berlin-Kreuzberg (Required)Language:English (Required)"]

title: Junior Legal Counsel (m/f/x)
description: Your area of expertise is that of a generalist for corporate matters and includes the areas of contract law, right of sale, e-commerce, IP/IT/media, data…
full_description:
['You will be part of our growing legal team of currently three Legal Counsels
Your area of expertise is that of a generalist for corporate matters and includes the areas of contract law, right of sale, e-commerce, IP/IT/media, data protection, corporate law and ideally employment law
You report to the Senior Legal Counsel Quandoo Group and the joint management of the Quandoo companies
You advise the joint management and the advisory board of the company
You support the management of the respective Quandoo subsidiaries (EU and APAC), as well as other senior positions and departments (Sales, Product, IT, Operations & Partner Management, Finance and Contract Management, Marketing, HR/Recruiting)
You coordinate the assistance of external legal counsel, both national and international, for the German and foreign subsidiaries
You are responsible for general operative and administrative legal actions
Qualifications
You must be a certified lawyer with a degree from either Germany, the UK or Australia and have been trained in one of these jurisdictions
You have approximately 2 years of experience as a Legal Counsel in an international context, ideally with start-ups in the IT sector
Learn and adapt to new and unfamiliar fields of law in a fast-paced environment
You communicate clearly and take pragmatic decisions
You think outside the box and find uncommon, but target-oriented solutions
As a German lawyer, your English is proficient both in the legal and general context; as an English or Australian lawyer, your German proficiency is B2 or higher
Additional Information
What we offer:
Attractive perks – access to Quandoo’s pension scheme as well as various fitness and lifestyle benefits
Modern equipment – state-of-the-art laptop & tools needed for optimal work results
Fun working environment – opportunity to collaborate with highly motivated colleagues and attend company parties, the weekly Qweekend and Quandoo’s Global Summit
Work-home balance – flexible working hours, home office possibilities and up to 30 days of vacation
High level of responsibility – the chance to hit the ground running from day one and shape your own career path
Want to be part of Quandoo’s future? Apply now!
Sounds like a cool job, but not for yourself? Please feel free to share this job description with your network!']

title: Junior Data Scientist (f/m/d)
description: You have already gained first practical experience in Data Analytics (in particular Data Preparation, Predictive Modelling, Machine Learning).
full_description:
["Your tasks
As a Junior Data Scientist, you analyze large amounts of data from a variety of different sources to uncover hidden relationships in our customers' business processes. By applying innovative statistical methods, you will actively participate in our product development and customer projects, thus creating direct added value in various industries. Your tasks include in particular:

Preparation and analysis of structured and unstructured data
Development of new algorithms and application of methods in the field of data analytics as well as visualization of analysis results
Active and continuous development of our analytics platform
Your Profile
You are aiming for a very good university degree with a quantitative focus (computer science, business informatics, mathematics, statistics, physics or related fields of study)
You have already gained first practical experience in Data Analytics (in particular Data Preparation, Predictive Modelling, Machine Learning)
Good knowledge of R or Python and database languages (e.g. SQL); ideally experience with additional technologies (e.g. Spark, Scala) as well as with data visualization solutions (e.g. D3.js)
Strong analytical understanding, curiosity and quick comprehension are your hallmarks
You have above-average team spirit and a high level of initiative
What we offer
A young and highly motivated team in a dynamic, fast growing start-up environment
Exciting projects using innovative technologies, methods and tools
Numerous opportunities for rapid professional and personal development
The opportunity to participate directly in the development of state-of-the-art analytics products"]

title: Lead Data Scientist
description: You have a good understanding of Data Privacy laws & Data Security or are keen to learn very fast about it.Working with our data, this include Data-cleaning,…
full_description:
["bonify – a Berlin based FinTech Startup enables customers to benefit from their credit scoring and financial data. We give customers free & easy access to their credit score and let them upload additional relevant data. Then we offer tools and personalized recommendations to help optimize our customer’s financial situation.

Founded in 2015 by key executives of McKinsey and Zalando, bonify has received significant funding from international leading VCs, e.g., Mosaic Ventures and Ribbit Capital, and successful entrepreneurs, e.g., Zalando founders and Raisin founders.

These will be your tasks


You will lead and supervise all partner communication with Risk- Managers in banks
Manage the development and deployment of the Data Science solutions end-to-end
Oversee the process of developing models for estimating credit-risk
Working with our data, this include Data-cleaning, Data-Modelling and Data-processing
Manage a cross functional team (Data-Science and Business Intelligence)
High competence in formulating business goals into analytics tasks

You're offering these qualifications


You have a Masters Degree or above preferably in either Computer Sciences or related
You have already acquired experience in project management with high focus on Research
You have a good understanding of Data Privacy laws & Data Security or are keen to learn very fast about it
Good understanding of Micro-services and creating architectures based on this principle
Good understanding of REST-Api’s and other forms (like queueing systems esp. RabbitMQ) of inter process communication
Knowledge of Relational and Non-Relational databases
Very high Python proficiency
Following tools have no secret for you: Graphana, ELK-Stack, Pandas, Scitkit-learn, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, RabbitMQ, Docker, Jenkins
Ability to perform even with short deadline
Exceptional conversational skills
Exceptional planning skills for research and development projects
Highly creative in finding solutions for difficult tasks in a short time frame
Proficiency in German Language (At least C1)

We're offering these benefits


Shape the future of the analytics department
Have an enormous chance to professional and personal growth
Take responsibility from day one. Take ownership of projects. See your innovation in the product.
Use our budget for education and growth (language Courses free Books) .
Enjoy the usual Start-up stuff: Dart, Table Football, Fresh Fruits
Enjoy free coffee and free beer!
Enjoy a workplace in the heart of Kreuzberg.

"]
